channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CAMEL-18100] camel-karaf - Cannot load OSGi blueprint due to Resumable classloading hell

item.summary: camel-karaf - Cannot load OSGi blueprint due to Resumable classloading hell

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Ah it looks like we have split/duplicate packages

org.apache.camel.resume │ 3.17.0 │ 59 │ org.apache.camel.camel-api
org.apache.camel.resume │ 3.17.0.SNAPSHOT │ 92 │ org.apache.camel.camel-support
